 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַזָּה‎</span> **proper name, of a location** ==Gaza==, <span class="bdbLangGreek">Γαζα</span> (Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***–azzutu***</u></abbr>, etc., [[BDB#COT|COT]]<sup>i. 97</sup> [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Pa 290, Tel Amarna</sup> <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***–azati, Azzati***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Wkl|Wkl]]<sup>38</sup> \*; Egyptian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***Ga¼atu***</u></abbr> [[BDB#WMM|WMM]]<sup>As.u.Eur.87,96,159,392</sup>; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Γαζα</span>, so Josephus<sup>Ant.«JOSEPHUS:Antiquities 13:5»xiii.5</sup>,5, etc.; Herod.<sup>ii, 159</sup>; iii. 5 <span class="bdbLangGreek">Κάδυτις</span>); — Philistine city (modern <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Ghazze, Razze), approximately Latitude 31 degrees; 3 minutes North, Longitude 34 degrees 28 minutes East, approximately 50 miles west-southwest from Jerusalem, near the sea ([[BDB#Rob|Rob]]<sup>BR ii. 36 ff.</sup> [[BDB#GASm|GASm]]<sup>Geogr. 181 ff.</sup> [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Geogr. 190 f.</sup>), [[Judg.16.1|Judg 16:1]]; [[Judg.16.21|Judg 16:21]] (both <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַזָּ֑תָה‎</span>), southernmost of the famous five cities, [[Gen.10.19|Gen 10:19]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Judg.6.4|Judg 6:4]]; [[1Kgs.5.4|1Kgs 5:4]]; [[2Kgs.18.8|2Kgs 18:8]], compare [[Deut.2.23|Deut 2:23]]; [[Josh.10.41|Josh 10:41]] ([[BDB#D|D]]); also [[Josh.11.22|Josh 11:22]] ([[BDB#D|D]]), [[Josh.15.47|Josh 15:47]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Judg.1.18|Judg 1:18]]; [[1Sam.6.17|1Sam 6:17]]; [[Amos.1.6|Amos 1:6]]; [[Amos.1.7|Amos 1:7]]; [[Zeph.2.4|Zeph 2:4]]; [[Jer.25.20|Jer 25:20]]; [[Jer.47.1|Jer 47:1]]; [[Jer.47.5|Jer 47:5]]; [[Zech.9.5|Zech 9:5]] (twice in verse); — On commercial importance see [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>B und S 989</sup> Gatt<sup>ZPV vii (1884), 1 ff., 293 ff.; viii (1885), 69 ff., 179 ff</sup>. — For <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַזָּה‎</span> [[1Chr.7.28|1Chr 7:28]] [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]], read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַיָּה‎</span> [[BDB#Baer|Baer]] [[BDB#Gi|Ginsb]] (q. v.), [[BDB#Be|Be]] Oettli [[BDB#Kau|Kau]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]]<sup>Hpt</sup>.; see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַי‎</span>.
